named-query.name: deleteDailySaving
named-query.query: delete from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: sumTransDebetSaving
named-query.query: select sum(x.transDebet) from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos>=:beginDate and x.id.pos<=:endDate and x.id.refId=:refId

named-query.name: sumTransCreditSaving
named-query.query: select sum(x.transCredit) from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos>=:beginDate and x.id.pos<=:endDate and x.id.refId=:refId

named-query.name: sumTransSaving
named-query.query: select x.id.refId,sum(x.transDebet),sum(x.transCredit) from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos>=:beginDate and x.id.pos<=:endDate and x.id.refId=:refId group by x.id.refId

named-query.name: getDailySaving
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.id.refId=:refId

named-query.name: getMonthlySaving
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=2 and x.month=:month and x.year=:year and x.id.refId=:refId

named-query.name: listDailySaving1
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productCode,x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailySaving2
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productCode,x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listMonthlySaving
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=2 and x.branch=:branch and x.month=:month and x.year=:year order by x.productCode,x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailySavingBySchema
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos and x.schema=:schema order by x.productCode,x.code

named-query.name: listDailySavingByProduct
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos and x.product=:product order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailySavingByProduct2
named-query.query: select x from SavingRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.id.pos=:pos and x.product=:product order by x.code

named-query.name: deleteDailyDeposit
named-query.query: delete from DepositRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: listDailyDeposit1
named-query.query: select x from DepositRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productCode,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyDeposit2
named-query.query: select x from DepositRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productCode,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyDepositByProduct
named-query.query: select x from DepositRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos and x.product=:product order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyDepositByProduct2
named-query.query: select x from DepositRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.id.pos=:pos and x.product=:product order by x.code

named-query.name: getDailyLoanByCode
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.code=:code and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: listCustomerLoan
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.customer=:customer and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: getMaxQuality
named-query.query: select max(x.quality) from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.customer=:customer and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: getDailyLoan
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.refId=:loan and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: deleteDailyLoan
named-query.query: delete from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos

named-query.name: listDailyLoan1
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoan2
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoan3
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.ao=:ao and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoan4
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.branch=:branch and x.ao=:ao and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByQuality1
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos and x.quality=1 order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByQuality2
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.company=:company and x.id.pos=:pos and x.quality>=2 order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByQuality3
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.branch=:branch and x.quality=1 order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByQuality4
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.branch=:branch and x.quality>=2 order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct1
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.company=:company and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct2
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.company=:company and x.quality=1 and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct3
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.company=:company and x.quality>=2 and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct4
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.branch=:branch and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct5
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.branch=:branch and x.quality=1 and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByProduct6
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.branch=:branch and x.quality>=2 and x.product=:product order by x.productName,x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo1
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo2
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.ao=:ao and x.quality=1 order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo3
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.ao=:ao and x.quality>=2 order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo4
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.quality=1 order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo5
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.quality>=2 order by x.code

named-query.name: listDailyLoanByAo6
named-query.query: select x from LoanRpt x where x.type=1 and x.id.pos=:pos and x.ao=:ao order by x.code
